channel.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
channel.description:
Welcome to Aeon, where your future of RSPS Gaming begins...
You're probably asking yourself a numerous amount of questions, and the main one.. "WHO ARE THE STAFF?". Well, the staff (CURRENTLY) are:
[ul][li]Myself[/li] [li]Lil_Smok3r[/li] [li]LoveandPower[/li] [li]CoonHunter[/li][/ul]
We're not currently looking for staff, but we may be in need of a beta tester. You can apply to be one, but you could be denied. Moving on...
[center][size=12pt][b]Updates[/b][/size][/center]
We're currently in progress of adding many features, we'll keep you updated HERE, whenever we do update. Our current updates:
Green - Complete Orange - In progress Red - Not started
Basic fire system Cannot light fires in banks Inferno Adze + effect + req. Unique ranking system Different colour fires Fletching Donator transport (magic carpet) - possible Clue scroll system Runesquares
[center][b][size=18pt]The Media![/size][/b][/center]
-COMING SOON-
Skype: mrjommanc8

I’ll be taking some screenshots soon, and giving them to Hugh Jass to upload onto here.

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:1, topic:542565”] I can’t wait to DDOS this server[/quote]that’s kind of mean lol um thanks for the heads up…

[hr]

naseem142:

Maybe add some pictures to actually show some of your work?

As soon as the rank system is completed they can get all the pictures your heart desires

[hr]

Server is good now they should be able to take some pics for you. For now I only have the very basic portion of the rank system added let me explain part of it here

I also welcome any feedback

-Owners are at the highest tier. They cannot be demoted in game, there are NO commands that ANY rank not even another owner can do on them. So if an owner gets hacked guess what, it won’t matter cause the other owner can get on and ban the little you know what.what I meant by this is I can remotely take down the server then just wait for other person to get on whatever communication device to further discuss.

-We do not have an administrator role at this time as I just don’t see a need. We may be have a contractor rank for development purposes later on if this gets large enough but I won’t even worry about that for now.

-Moderators are that, those who moderate. Because of this they have certain powers such as mute and ban but they can only be done to a certain right level that is preset by myself. They cannot ban higher ranks and they are unable to ban each other. A mod should not be able to discipline another mod. IT isn’t their job but a higher staff members.

-Some very basic code has been made for future use with a website so moderators can also perform actions in case they are not online/same with administrators. The same power rankings are in effect here as well.

In other news I have completed random events so far we have

-sandwich lady(custom, she doesn’t do the runescape interface but instead is a “skill trivia” bot. This is my way of making sure skillers are not botting etc. Pretty much what will happen is the npc will appear at the square south of the person. From there it cycles in the event to cancel that players skill variable(this way they can’t close the dialogues etc). You are then asked a skilling question. I only have one so far and it’s for testing purposes “what is the color of the bucket” the answer is brown. But there is a listing of like three choices (red, brown, yellow). I want to also make it color blind friendly though so if you are that please let me know how I could maybe keep colors friendly to you. Oh and I also forgot to mention that during this particular cycle you are unable to perform any commands (cough ::empty cough )
-rock golem
-tree spirit
-river troll
-and one more but I already forgot what it was o.0

the combat ones are pretty much like runescape. I will probably beef up their stats a tad more than RuneScape though just to be on the safe side. I still need to write an actual defence formula sigh…

Other thoughts: I know a person could possibly still keep using an auto clicker even with the sandwich lady so I am very tempted to add a skill trivia timer like where you die or something if you don’t answer it in time and you get kind of teleported at a random location I set.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Hugh_Jass Hugh Jass
item.description:
@Hugh_Jass wrote:

April 22, 2014

–About 70% complete with rank/command system. I still need to add logs etc to go along with it. Will be asking a couple of friends for some advice ina couple of areas…
-Added basic trawler minigame (administrators will need to test once I finalize a few things )
-Added random events for the rock golem etc. Should keep some fun in the game. Will be challenging monsters. They won’t be weaklings :D… I am also looking for a “skiller alternative” so we don’t hurt our skiller friends feelings <3
-Had to partially rewrite mining to work with rock golem
-Had to fix an issue with npc clipping
-Basic clue scroll system added… Credits to old rewards go to Myth-Scape source. (will of course be having administrators spamming to see what needs to be removed/what is nulled )
-Puzzle Boxes should now be live but have not been fully tested.
-Started on my FAVORITE minigame/hobby back in the old days, runesquares. I can’t wait until it’s done.

-L&P

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Development on my side has been kind of slow with my work load in real life. I have been mostly reworking the commands and the ranking system this week though. I will post an official update later after it’s completed. It may not be until next week.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Hugh_Jass Hugh Jass
item.description:
@Hugh_Jass wrote:

4.12.14
-fletching skill has been partially completed.
–you can now make bows and bolts ( I need to research how to do darts… )
–bolts include the general metal ones and also things such as topaz etc
–all levels should be right as per taken from the wiki
-started to review commands file for further investigation on how to set up a proper rank/commands system
-i thought of a really cool idea for donor transportation … a magic carpet ride? Let me know what you think . That or maybe it could be a gold sink. Closer teleports with the rugs to bosses and donors or something get a discount not 100% sure yet how I want it to roll.
-After discussion with part of the team they want to have a lot of minigames so wer want you guys to help us think of all of the minigames you can think of. Custom or rs style it doesn’t matter which.
-Discussion of instance dungeons was also discussed and this has become a possibility. I will be reviewing how this can be doine without ruining the eco. I am more than willing to take feedback of course.

-L&P

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Rexxy, post:5, topic:541950”]Okay, I have played my fair share of servers but so far this one sounds like it has had the most work done to it. I would love to see this server when it is completely done.

Also, I remember a few years ago there was this server that had Effigys. And you got them from cutting logs, lighting fires, fishing, etc; and when you clicked on them you would get 1 reward/skill point. Which then you used in this skill shop for stuff like clothes, (that one pickaxe that you got from lighting the beacons in real RS then you would talk to the King to get it), or even a mystery box that would have like a 1:1000000 chance for a Godsword, Partyhat, etc. Just a thought though. :D[/quote]thanks for the suggestions we will keep them on hand and after the current bugs/current redoing of the skills are completed we will discuss maybe adding some of this content as it does sound interesting. I want to kind of put a “Shining Force” theme to it if you have ever played that before!

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

Okay, I have played my fair share of servers but so far this one sounds like it has had the most work done to it. I would love to see this server when it is completely done.

Also, I remember a few years ago there was this server that had Effigys. And you got them from cutting logs, lighting fires, fishing, etc; and when you clicked on them you would get 1 reward/skill point. Which then you used in this skill shop for stuff like clothes, (that one pickaxe that you got from lighting the beacons in real RS then you would talk to the King to get it), or even a mystery box that would have like a 1:1000000 chance for a Godsword, Partyhat, etc. Just a thought though.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

04/08/2014:

Some nice updates today!

-Semi-custom cycle event system. Some insight from a friend towards how to do this. I also leaned towards some suggestions that were given to me from when I worked on the czar project. Cycled events can now be done at random times(which I will be using with commands most likely), or as per cycled events such as skills.

-Clipping system has been started. I have been looking at the one that ( paladino?) released and been making some minor changes here and there and been studying up on how this can be improved. Currently taking suggestions on how it can be improved or more efficient for that matter.

-Basic Firemaking has been added
-has animation
-does different logs in games
-does the different color fires
-makes ashes
-uses cycles
-inferno adze effect
-inferno adze requirement(the firemaking level)
-can’t light fires in bank ( seers only at the moment was to test )

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Aeon - A unique gaming experience [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I don’t know if I would call it flawless lol…

I will be adding my Ape Atoll base to this and a few other items once I get done doing a few more items with some internal sections.
